text.section: Each commissioner, the Chairman of the Commission, the General Counsel, the Executive Secretary, and the Executive Director are entitled to compensation as provided in the State budget.

section.section: The salary of the Chairman of the Commission shall be at least $40,000 a year.
The salary of each commissioner shall be at least $35,000 a year.

text.section: A commissioner and other Commission personnel are entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
